description: Performs a recipe step within an interactive DataBrew session that's currently open.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the project to apply the action to.

parameters.name: RecipeStep
parameters.description: Represents a single step from a DataBrew recipe to be performed. The particular action to be performed in the recipe step. The name of a valid DataBrew transformation to be performed on the data. Parameters (dict) --- Contextual parameters for the transformation. (string) --- (string) --- ConditionExpressions (list) --- One or more conditions that must be met for the recipe step to succeed. (dict) --- Represents an individual condition that evaluates to true or false. Conditions are used with recipe actions. The action is only performed for column values where the condition evaluates to true. If a recipe requires more than one condition, then the recipe must specify multiple ConditionExpression elements. Each condition is applied to the rows in a dataset first, before the recipe action is performed. A specific condition to apply to a recipe action. For more information, see Recipe structure in the Glue DataBrew Developer Guide. Value (string) --- A value that the condition must evaluate to for the condition to succeed. A column to apply this condition to.

nested_params.name: Action
nested_params.description: The particular action to be performed in the recipe step.

nested_params.name: Operation
nested_params.description: The name of a valid DataBrew transformation to be performed on the data.

nested_params.name: ConditionExpressions
nested_params.description: One or more conditions that must be met for the recipe step to succeed.

nested_params.name: Condition
nested_params.description: A specific condition to apply to a recipe action. For more information, see Recipe structure in the Glue DataBrew Developer Guide.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: A value that the condition must evaluate to for the condition to succeed.

nested_params.name: TargetColumn
nested_params.description: A column to apply this condition to.

parameters.name: ViewFrame
parameters.description: Represents the data being transformed during an action. The starting index for the range of columns to return in the view frame. ColumnRange (integer) --- The number of columns to include in the view frame, beginning with the StartColumnIndex value and ignoring any columns in the HiddenColumns list. HiddenColumns (list) --- A list of columns to hide in the view frame. (string) --- StartRowIndex (integer) --- The starting index for the range of rows to return in the view frame. RowRange (integer) --- The number of rows to include in the view frame, beginning with the StartRowIndex value. Analytics (string) --- Controls if analytics computation is enabled or disabled. Enabled by default.

nested_params.name: StartColumnIndex
nested_params.description: The starting index for the range of columns to return in the view frame.

nested_params.name: ColumnRange
nested_params.description: The number of columns to include in the view frame, beginning with the StartColumnIndex value and ignoring any columns in the HiddenColumns list.

nested_params.name: HiddenColumns
nested_params.description: A list of columns to hide in the view frame.

nested_params.name: StartRowIndex
nested_params.description: The starting index for the range of rows to return in the view frame.

nested_params.name: RowRange
nested_params.description: The number of rows to include in the view frame, beginning with the StartRowIndex value.

nested_params.name: Analytics
nested_params.description: Controls if analytics computation is enabled or disabled. Enabled by default.

nested_items.name: Result
nested_items.description: A message indicating the result of performing the action.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the project that was affected by the action.

nested_items.name: ActionId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the action that was performed.
